name: ShootJump
description:
SPEEDRUN IS YOUR GOAL

To make speedrunning easier, you have a shotgun to boost yourself in the opposite direction in which the player is looking. There are 5 levels in this game.

Have fun.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement.
  • Space - Jump.
  • Left Ctrl - Slide.
  • Left Click - Shoot.
  • R - Reload.
